tool_description: IDfyâ€™s IBBI Verification API allows users to determine if an Indian corporation is currently under bankruptcy as per the regulations set by the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI).

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request made to the API.

api_list.name: India Bankruptcy Verification
api_list.description: Verifies if a corporation is under bankruptcy according to the IBBI. This API is part of the process established under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016.
